title: How to Make Peanut Butter and Banana Crescents

steps.headline: Form 4 long rectangles from the dough.
steps.description: You may have to pinch and seal any pre-cut tears.

steps.headline: Cut the rectangles in half.
steps.description: You will now have 8 small 3 ⁄2 inch (8.9 cm) squares.

steps.headline: Add a generous small scoop of peanut butter in the middle of each square.
Position about 2-3 banana slices on top of the peanut butter.
Fold over the dough like a blanket.
steps.description: Pinch the edges together with your fingers or a fork to seal. Brush the tops with the beaten egg and nuts.

steps.headline: Allow to cool for a few minutes before serving.

text: Preheat the oven to 375ºF/190ºC.  Form 4 long rectangles from the dough. You may have to pinch and seal any pre-cut tears. Cut the rectangles in half. You will now have 8 small 3 ⁄2 inch (8.9 cm) squares. Add a generous small scoop of peanut butter in the middle of each square.  Position about 2-3 banana slices on top of the peanut butter.  Fold over the dough like a blanket. Pinch the edges together with your fingers or a fork to seal. Brush the tops with the beaten egg and nuts. Bake for 11 to 13 minutes.  Allow to cool for a few minutes before serving.
